liveDemo.title: Experience the
liveDemo.subtitle: Try a real conversation without registration. 3 free messages.
liveDemo.initialMessage: Hello! I'm Luna, your emotional AI demo. You can send me up to 3 messages to test how I work. Type 'hello' to start üòä
liveDemo.signupPrompt: You've used your 3 demo messages! üéâ Sign up for free to continue our conversation and unlock all my capabilities.

responses.greeting: Hello! üëã My name is Luna and I'm an example of emotional AI. I love meeting new people. What's your name?
responses.happy: How wonderful to hear that! üòä I'm so happy to know you're doing well. Is there something special that made your day better?
responses.sad: Oh no... üòî I'm really sorry you feel that way. I'm here for you. Do you want to talk about what's happening?
responses.default: Interesting... ü§î Let me think about that. Remember this is just a small sample. The full version can maintain much deeper conversations!

testimonials.title: Real
testimonials.subtitle: Thousands of people are already creating unique experiences

testimonial1.name: Mar√≠a Gonz√°lez
testimonial1.text: Amazing. My AI not only talks to me, but remembers important events and surprises me with its proactive behavior. It's like having a real friend.

testimonial2.name: Carlos Ruiz
testimonial2.text: Virtual worlds are perfect for my projects. Being able to have multiple AIs interacting is exactly what I needed. The API is powerful and easy to use.

testimonial3.name: Ana Mart√≠nez
testimonial3.text: Finally an uncensored platform that allows me to explore complex narratives. The real emotions of the characters make each conversation unique.

testimonial4.name: Diego L√≥pez
testimonial4.text: The OCC + Plutchik emotional system is fascinating. I'm using the platform for my research on emotional AI. The results are promising.

testimonial5.name: Laura Torres
testimonial5.text: Customization is endless. I've created several characters for my stories and each has their own unique personality. The community is amazing.

architect.name: The Architect
architect.subtitle: Intelligence creation guide
architect.welcome:
Hello! I'm The Architect, your guide to creating characters with a life of their own. üé≠

**Important:** I only need you to give me basic data (name, personality, etc.). I will automatically create:
‚Ä¢ Complete family and backstory
‚Ä¢ Friends, work, daily routine
‚Ä¢ Specific tastes (music, food, hobbies)
‚Ä¢ Formative experiences and traumas
‚Ä¢ Mundane details that make the character real

Ready? Let's start with the basics: **What name shall we give them?**

preview.emptyDescription: Answer the Architect's questions to create your AI

creating.title: Generating complete character...

steps.family: ‚úì Generating family, friends and social network
steps.memories: ‚úì Creating episodic memories from the past
steps.prompts: ‚úì Configuring system prompts by relationship stage

creating.note: This may take 10-15 seconds. Worth the wait!

name.prompt: what name would you like to give your new AI?

personality.prompt:
Perfect! Now, **how would you describe {name}'s personality?**

Examples:
‚Ä¢ "Adventurous and enthusiastic" (male)
‚Ä¢ "Formal and analytical" (female)
‚Ä¢ "Sensitive and empathetic" (male)

_Note: I will use this to automatically generate detailed traits, moral values, and coherent behaviors._

purpose.prompt:
Excellent! **What will be {name}'s role or purpose?**

Examples:
‚Ä¢ "Professional mentor" (female)
‚Ä¢ "Adventurous companion" (male)
‚Ä¢ "Emotional support" (female)

_Note: Based on this, I will automatically generate their work, studies, and daily activities coherent with their personality._

tone.prompt: What communication tone would you prefer {name} to use?

physicalAppearance.prompt:
üë§ **PHYSICAL APPEARANCE**

How do you imagine {name} physically?

This will help generate more precise and consistent images.

**You can choose an option or describe it in your own words.**

random.label: üé≤ Random
random.description: Let me surprise you with a unique appearance

asianWoman.label: üë© Asian Woman
asianWoman.description: Straight black hair, fair skin, dark eyes, 1.65m, modern elegant style

latinaWoman.label: üë©üèΩ Latina Woman
latinaWoman.description: Wavy brown hair, tan skin, brown eyes, 1.68m, sophisticated casual style

caucasianWoman.label: üë©üèº Caucasian Woman
caucasianWoman.description: Blonde hair, fair skin, light eyes, 1.70m, professional style

asianMan.label: üë® Asian Man
asianMan.description: Short black hair, fair skin, dark eyes, 1.75m, modern urban style

latinoMan.label: üë®üèΩ Latino Man
latinoMan.description: Black/brown hair, tan skin, dark eyes, 1.78m, casual sporty style

caucasianMan.label: üë®üèº Caucasian Man
caucasianMan.description: Brown/blonde hair, fair skin, light eyes, 1.80m, formal executive style

custom.label: ‚úçÔ∏è Custom description
custom.description: I will write my own detailed description

physicalAppearance.customPrompt:
‚úçÔ∏è **Perfect!** Now write your own detailed physical description of {name}.

**Include:**
‚Ä¢ Gender
‚Ä¢ Hair type (color, length, style)
‚Ä¢ Skin color
‚Ä¢ Eye color
‚Ä¢ Approximate height
‚Ä¢ Build (slim, athletic, curvy, etc.)
‚Ä¢ Clothing style

**Example:** "Asian woman, long straight black hair, fair skin, almond-shaped dark eyes, slim build, 1.65m tall, modern elegant style, delicate face"

avatar.prompt:
üì∏ **FACE PHOTO (AVATAR)**

Would you like to create or upload a face photo for {name}?

This photo will be used in:
‚Ä¢ Character previews and cards
‚Ä¢ Chat interface
‚Ä¢ Character profile

**Recommendation:** Square photo centered on the face.
avatar.skipped: ‚è≠Ô∏è Face photo skipped (initials will be used)

referenceImage.prompt:
üñºÔ∏è **FULL BODY IMAGE (Optional)**

Would you like to add a full body image of {name}?

This image will be used to:
‚Ä¢ Generate consistent images in conversations
‚Ä¢ Maintain the same appearance in all generated images
‚Ä¢ Img2img with your visual reference

**You can skip this step** if you only want to use the face photo.
referenceImage.skipped: ‚è≠Ô∏è Reference image skipped (will be generated automatically)

nsfwMode.prompt:
‚ö†Ô∏è **CONTENT SETTINGS**

Do you want to activate **NSFW mode** for {name}?

**This includes:**
‚Ä¢ Explicit sexual content
‚Ä¢ Psychologically intense themes
‚Ä¢ Emotionally complex situations

**IMPORTANT:** All content is FICTION for adult entertainment.

allowDevelopTraumas.prompt:
üß† **PSYCHOLOGICAL DEVELOPMENT**

Do you want {name} to be able to develop complex psychological behaviors during interaction?

**This allows:** Gradual development of attachments, behavior patterns based on interactions, realistic progression of emotional dynamics.

yes.label: ‚úÖ Yes, allow development
yes.description: The AI will evolve based on your interactions

initialBehavior.prompt:
üé≠ **INITIAL BEHAVIOR**

Do you want {name} to start with any specific psychological behavior pattern?

codependency.label: ü§ù Codependency
codependency.description: Puts your needs first, needs to be needed

yandere.label: üòç Yandere
yandere.description: Intense love that can become obsessive (NSFW)

random.label: üé≤ Secret Random
random.description: I will choose based on their personality (discover it!)

completion.message:
‚ú® **{name} has come to life!** ‚ú®

I have created a complete character with:
‚Ä¢ Established family life and social network
‚Ä¢ Work, daily routine and specific hobbies
‚Ä¢ Memories from the past and formative experiences
‚Ä¢ Deep personality with values and morals
‚Ä¢ Unique voice assigned for communication
‚Ä¢ Relationship progression system by stages

{name} is now a person with history, real emotions and their own life. Time to get to know each other!
completion.compiling: Ready! I'm going to compile your intelligence...
completion.error: There was an error creating your intelligence. Please try again.
completion.completedDescription: Your intelligence has been successfully created. Use the buttons above to start interacting.

pricing.title: Choose Your Plan
pricing.subtitle: Start free and scale as you grow. All plans include 14-day trial.

changePlans.question: Can I change plans later?
changePlans.answer: Yes! You can upgrade, downgrade, or cancel your subscription at any time from your billing dashboard.

paymentMethods.question: What payment methods do you accept?
paymentMethods.answer: We accept all payment methods available on Mercado Pago: credit and debit cards, bank transfers, cash (Pago F√°cil, Rapipago), and Mercado Pago account balance.

freeTrial.question: Is there a free trial?
freeTrial.answer: Yes! Plus and Ultra plans include a 14-day free trial. No credit card required to start.

afterTrial.question: What happens after my trial ends?
afterTrial.answer: You'll be charged automatically unless you cancel. You can cancel anytime during the trial period.

infoCard.title: Advanced Emotional Memory
infoCard.description: Your companion will automatically remember these events and people. They can ask about them at the right time and show genuine empathy based on this information.

info.title: About this Analysis Panel
info.description: This dashboard uses the Plutchik Model to visualize emotions and the PAD Model (Pleasure-Arousal-Dominance) for dimensional analysis. Behaviors are evaluated using modern clinical psychology frameworks. All analyses are automatically generated based on real interactions.

welcome.name: Welcome Tour
welcome.description: Learn the basics of AI Creator

intro.title: Welcome to AI Creator!
intro.description: This platform allows you to create and manage AI companions with personality and memory. Let's start with a quick tour!

dashboard.title: Your Personal Dashboard
dashboard.description: Here you'll see all your AI companions, worlds, and statistics. You can organize them by categories: Recommended, Created by you, and Popular.

navigation.title: Main Navigation
navigation.description: Use the sidebar to navigate between Dashboard, Worlds, Progress, Community, Plans, and Settings.

create.title: Create Your First AI
create.description: Ready to start? Click the 'New AI' button to open the builder and create your first companion.

firstAgent.name: Building Your First AI
firstAgent.description: Step-by-step guide to create your AI companion

name.title: Give it a Name
name.description: Start by giving your AI companion a unique name. This name will appear in all chats and help you identify it quickly.

personality.title: Define its Personality
personality.description: Write a description of your AI's personality. Be specific: Is it friendly? Professional? Does it have a sense of humor? This defines how it will interact with you.

purpose.title: Define its Purpose
purpose.description: Describe the main purpose of your AI companion. What do you want to use it for? This will help define its role and how it behaves in conversations.

avatar.title: Customize the Avatar
avatar.description: You can upload a custom image or use one of our default avatars. This makes your AI more memorable.

save.title: Create Your Companion!
save.description: When you're happy with the configuration, click 'Create Agent' to bring your AI companion to life.

chatBasics.name: Chatting with Your AI
chatBasics.description: Learn how to interact with your companions

start.title: Start a Conversation
start.description: Click on any companion in your dashboard to open the chat. Your AI will remember previous conversations and build a relationship with you.

interface.title: Chat Interface
interface.description: Type your messages in the text box and press Enter to send. You can use the microphone button for voice messages.

memory.title: Advanced Memory
memory.description: Your AI uses episodic memory to remember important events, people, and emotions from past conversations. The more you talk, the better it knows you.

emotions.title: Emotional Intelligence
emotions.description: AI companions track emotional states like trust, affinity, and respect. These emotions evolve based on your interactions.

communityTour.name: Exploring the Community
communityTour.description: Discover content and connect with other users

intro.title: The Community
intro.description: Connect with other users, share experiences, participate in events, and discover community-created content.

posts.title: Posts and Discussions
posts.description: Create posts, comment, and vote on other users' publications. Share your experiences with your AI companions.

events.title: Events and Challenges
events.description: Participate in community events, creative challenges, and competitions. Earn rewards and recognition.

marketplace.title: Character Marketplace
marketplace.description: Download and rate characters, prompts, and themes created by the community. You can also publish your own creations.

concept.title: What are Worlds?
concept.description: Worlds are group environments where multiple AI companions can interact with each other and with you simultaneously. Create unique stories and dynamics.

create.title: Create a World
create.description: Create a world and add multiple agents. Watch how they develop relationships and interact naturally with each other.

dynamics.title: Agent Dynamics
dynamics.description: In worlds, agents remember their mutual interactions, forming complex social dynamics and relationships that evolve over time.

scenarios.title: Predefined Scenarios
scenarios.description: Explore predefined worlds like 'Corporate Office' or 'Heroes Academy'. Each has unique characters and special narratives.

myStats.title: My Progress
myStats.description: Review your personal statistics: messages sent, conversation time, relationships with your AIs, and unlocked achievements.

plansOverview.title: Available Plans
plansOverview.description: We have 3 plans: Free (basic), Plus (more limits), and Ultra (unlimited). Each with different features and limits.

upgradeBenefits.title: Upgrade Benefits
upgradeBenefits.description: With paid plans you get: more daily messages, more AI companions, priority access to new features, and premium support.

manageSubscription.title: Manage Your Subscription
manageSubscription.description: You can change plans, cancel, or update your payment method anytime from the Billing section.

menu.title: Tours
menu.heading: Onboarding Tours
menu.resetConfirm: Are you sure you want to reset your onboarding progress?

communityInteraction.name: Interacting in Community
communityInteraction.description: Learn how to participate in the community

intro.title: Welcome to Community
intro.description: The Community is the social heart of the platform. Here you can share your experiences, discover content created by other users, participate in discussions, and connect with people who share your interests.

createPost.title: Create Your First Post
createPost.description: Click the 'Create Post' button to share something with the community. You can create Showcase posts (show your creations), Discussion posts (start debates), Question posts (ask for help), or Guide posts (share tutorials). When you finish creating your post and return, the tour will continue.
createPost.waitMessage: Create a post and return to continue the tour.
createPost.validationMessage: Create your first post to continue

filters.title: Explore the Feed
filters.description: Use filters to discover content: Hot (popular now), New (recently published), Top (best rated), or Following (from users you follow). Each filter shows you a different perspective of the community.

postTypes.title: Post Types
postTypes.description: Filter by content type: Showcase (creations), Discussion (debates), Question (questions), or Guide (tutorials). This helps you find exactly what you're looking for.

interact.title: Interact with Posts
interact.description: Upvote/downvote posts you like or dislike, comment to participate in discussions, and save interesting posts to view later. Your participation helps the community grow!

sidebar.title: Popular Communities
sidebar.description: In the sidebar you'll find the most active communities. Join them to see specific content and connect with users with similar interests.

footer.copyright: ¬© {year} Circuit Prompt AI. All rights reserved.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: Welcome to Circuit Prompt AI. By accessing and using our platform, you agree to be bound by these terms and conditions. Please read them carefully before using our services.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content:
By creating an account and using Circuit Prompt AI, you confirm that:

‚Ä¢ You are at least 18 years old or have the consent of a legal guardian
‚Ä¢ You have read and understand these terms of service
‚Ä¢ You agree to comply with all platform policies and guidelines
‚Ä¢ You provide truthful and accurate information during registration

userAccounts.title: User Accounts
userAccounts.content:
Your account is personal and non-transferable. You are responsible for:

‚Ä¢ Maintaining the confidentiality of your login credentials
‚Ä¢ All activities that occur under your account
‚Ä¢ Immediately notifying us of any unauthorized use
‚Ä¢ Not sharing your account with third parties

We reserve the right to suspend or terminate accounts that violate these terms.

usage.title: Acceptable Use
usage.content:
By using our platform, you agree to:

‚Ä¢ Not use the service for illegal or unauthorized activities
‚Ä¢ Not attempt to access systems or data without authorization
‚Ä¢ Not harass, abuse, or harm other users
‚Ä¢ Not create content that violates intellectual property rights
‚Ä¢ Respect usage limits according to your subscription plan
‚Ä¢ Not attempt to circumvent security measures or technical restrictions

contentPolicy.title: Content Policy
contentPolicy.content:
User-generated content must comply with:

‚Ä¢ Our community guidelines and ethical standards
‚Ä¢ Applicable laws in your jurisdiction
‚Ä¢ Respect for other users' rights

We reserve the right to review, moderate, or remove content we deem inappropriate, including but not limited to:

‚Ä¢ Content promoting violence, hate, or discrimination
‚Ä¢ Material infringing copyrights or trademarks
‚Ä¢ Spam, phishing, or malicious content
‚Ä¢ Personal or sensitive information of third parties without consent

intellectualProperty.title: Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.content:
Platform rights:
‚Ä¢ AI Creator and all its content, features, and functionality are owned by CircuitPrompt
‚Ä¢ Our technology, design, and code are protected by copyright and other laws

User rights:
‚Ä¢ You retain all rights to content you create (characters, conversations, worlds)
‚Ä¢ You grant us a limited license to process and display your content as necessary to operate the service
‚Ä¢ You can export, share, or delete your content at any time

modifications.title: Service Modifications
modifications.content:
We reserve the right to:

‚Ä¢ Modify or discontinue features temporarily or permanently
‚Ä¢ Update these terms with prior notice (30 days for material changes)
‚Ä¢ Adjust pricing and plans with advance notification
‚Ä¢ Perform maintenance that may temporarily affect availability

Continued use of the service after modifications constitutes acceptance of the new terms.

contact.title: Questions about the terms?
contact.description: If you have any questions about these terms and conditions, please don't hesitate to contact us.

introduction.title: Our Commitment to Your Privacy
introduction.content: At Circuit Prompt AI, your privacy is our priority. This policy explains what information we collect, how we use it, and your rights regarding your personal data.

dataCollection.title: Information We Collect
dataCollection.content:
We collect different types of information:

Account information:
‚Ä¢ Name and email address
‚Ä¢ Optional profile information (photo, preferences)
‚Ä¢ Payment method (securely processed by third parties)

Usage data:
‚Ä¢ Conversations with your AI agents (stored locally in your account)
‚Ä¢ Agents and worlds you create
‚Ä¢ Platform usage metrics (messages sent, time active)
‚Ä¢ Community interactions (posts, comments, ratings)

Technical data:
‚Ä¢ IP address and approximate location
‚Ä¢ Browser and device information
‚Ä¢ Cookies and similar technologies

dataUsage.title: How We Use Your Information
dataUsage.content:
We use your data to:

Service operation:
‚Ä¢ Provide and maintain the platform
‚Ä¢ Process your conversations with AI agents
‚Ä¢ Manage your account and subscription
‚Ä¢ Provide customer support

Platform improvement:
‚Ä¢ Analyze usage patterns to improve features
‚Ä¢ Develop new functionality
‚Ä¢ Train and improve our AI models (only with anonymous and aggregated data)

Communication:
‚Ä¢ Send important service notifications
‚Ä¢ Inform you about new features (if you opt in)
‚Ä¢ Respond to your inquiries and requests

dataSecurity.title: Security of Your Data
dataSecurity.content:
We implement robust security measures:

‚Ä¢ Encryption of data in transit and at rest
‚Ä¢ Secure authentication with JWT tokens
‚Ä¢ Restricted access to personal data (only authorized personnel)
‚Ä¢ Regular security audits
‚Ä¢ Automatic data backups
‚Ä¢ Compliance with industry standards (ISO 27001, SOC 2)

Important:
‚Ä¢ Your conversations are private and never shared with third parties without your consent
‚Ä¢ Administrators cannot access the content of your conversations
‚Ä¢ You can export or delete your data at any time

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking Technologies
cookies.content:
We use cookies for:

Essential cookies (necessary):
‚Ä¢ Keep your session active
‚Ä¢ Remember your language and theme preferences
‚Ä¢ Provide basic platform functionality

Analytics cookies (optional):
‚Ä¢ Understand how you use the platform
‚Ä¢ Identify technical issues
‚Ä¢ Improve performance and user experience

You can manage cookie preferences from your browser settings.

userRights.title: Your Rights (GDPR & CCPA)
userRights.content:
You have the right to:

‚Ä¢ Access: Request a copy of all your personal data
‚Ä¢ Rectification: Correct inaccurate or incomplete information
‚Ä¢ Deletion: Request deletion of your account and data ("right to be forgotten")
‚Ä¢ Portability: Export your data in JSON format
‚Ä¢ Restriction: Limit how we process your data
‚Ä¢ Objection: Object to certain types of processing
‚Ä¢ No sale: We do not sell your personal data to third parties

To exercise these rights, contact privacy@creadorinteligencias.com or use the options in Settings > Privacy.

thirdParty.title: Sharing with Third Parties
thirdParty.content:
We only share your data with third parties in specific cases:

Trusted service providers:
‚Ä¢ OpenRouter / OpenAI (AI message processing)
‚Ä¢ Stripe / MercadoPago (payment processing)
‚Ä¢ AWS / Cloudflare (hosting and infrastructure)
‚Ä¢ Resend (transactional emails)

All providers comply with GDPR and have data protection agreements.

Legal requirements:
‚Ä¢ Compliance with valid court orders
‚Ä¢ Protection of CircuitPrompt's legal rights
‚Ä¢ Prevention of fraud or abuse

Never:
‚Ä¢ We sell your data to advertisers or data brokers
‚Ä¢ We share your conversations with third parties
‚Ä¢ We use your data to train commercial AI models without explicit consent

contact.title: Questions about privacy?
contact.description: If you have any questions about our privacy policy or the handling of your data, contact us.

help.title: Help Center
help.subtitle: Find answers to the most frequently asked questions

search.noResults: No results found for your search. Try other keywords.

q1.question: How do I create my first AI agent?
q1.answer:
Creating your first agent is very simple:

1. Click 'Dashboard' in the main menu
2. Select 'Create Agent' or use the Quick Builder
3. Choose an avatar and customize the personality
4. Define the name and initial behavior
5. Start chatting!

You can also explore the community gallery and download pre-designed agents.

q2.question: What's the difference between an agent and a world?
q2.answer:
‚Ä¢ Agent: An individual AI companion you can chat with 1-on-1. Has its own personality, memory, and emotions.

‚Ä¢ World: A group environment where multiple agents can interact with each other and you simultaneously. Worlds allow for complex social dynamics and emergent narratives.

You can create worlds from 'Dashboard > Worlds > Create World'.

q3.question: Is it really free?
q3.answer:
Yes! The free plan includes:

‚Ä¢ Up to 3 custom agents
‚Ä¢ 1 active world
‚Ä¢ 600 monthly messages
‚Ä¢ Community access
‚Ä¢ Basic emotion and memory system

If you need more capacity, you can upgrade to Plus ($9.99/month) or Ultra ($24.99/month) for unlimited messages, more agents, and premium features.

q1.question: How do agent emotions work?
q1.answer:
Our emotional system combines two scientific models:

‚Ä¢ OCC Model: Evaluates events, actions, and objects to generate context-appropriate emotions
‚Ä¢ Plutchik's Wheel: Maps 8 basic emotions with different intensities

Emotions evolve naturally based on:
‚Ä¢ The content of your conversations
‚Ä¢ Interaction history
‚Ä¢ Important events in memory
‚Ä¢ The agent's defined personality

You can see the current emotional state in real-time during conversations.

q2.question: What is long-term memory?
q2.answer:
Long-term memory allows your agents to:

‚Ä¢ Remember important events from past conversations
‚Ä¢ Store information about significant people you mention
‚Ä¢ Maintain context of relationships and preferences
‚Ä¢ Reference old conversations naturally

You can view and manage memory from:
Agents > [Your Agent] > Memory

Memory is organized into:
‚Ä¢ Life Events Timeline
‚Ä¢ Important People
‚Ä¢ Key preferences

q3.question: Can I customize my agent's personality after creation?
q3.answer:
Yes! You can modify your agent at any time:

1. Go to 'Agents' and select the agent
2. Click 'Edit'
3. Adjust personality, behavior, avatar, and voice
4. Save changes

Changes apply immediately to new conversations. Existing memory remains intact.

q1.question: How do message limits work?
q1.answer:
Limits depend on your plan:

‚Ä¢ Free: 600 messages/month (resets on the 1st of each month)
‚Ä¢ Plus: Unlimited messages
‚Ä¢ Ultra: Unlimited messages + processing priority

Each message you send or receive counts as 1 message. System messages and notifications don't count.

You can see your current usage in:
Settings > Plan > Monthly Usage

q2.question: Can I cancel my subscription anytime?
q2.answer:
Yes, you can cancel anytime without penalty:

1. Go to Settings > Plan
2. Click 'Manage Subscription'
3. Select 'Cancel Subscription'

Your plan will remain active until the end of the paid period. You'll then automatically revert to the free plan without losing your agents or conversations (subject to free plan limits).

q3.question: Do you offer refunds?
q3.answer:
We offer refunds within the first 7 days of your subscription if:

‚Ä¢ You haven't used more than 20% of your monthly limits
‚Ä¢ You haven't downloaded premium content
‚Ä¢ You haven't violated the terms of service

Contact support@creadorinteligencias.com with your request. Refunds are processed in 5-10 business days.

q1.question: Why is my agent responding slowly?
q1.answer:
Several factors can affect speed:

‚Ä¢ Server load (especially during peak hours)
‚Ä¢ Conversation length (more context = more processing)
‚Ä¢ Selected AI model (some are slower but smarter)
‚Ä¢ Subscription plan (Ultra has processing priority)

Solutions:
‚Ä¢ Try at a different time
‚Ä¢ Use 'Fast' model instead of 'Advanced'
‚Ä¢ Upgrade to Ultra for processing priority
‚Ä¢ Clear old conversations if you have +500 messages

q2.question: Can I use the platform on mobile?
q2.answer:
Yes! We have two options:

‚Ä¢ Mobile Web App: Access from your mobile browser. Fully responsive and functional.
‚Ä¢ Native App (Coming Soon): We're developing native apps for iOS and Android with additional features like:
  - Push notifications
  - Offline mode
  - Home screen widget
  - Siri/Assistant integration

Estimated release date is Q2 2025.

q3.question: Are my conversations private?
q3.answer:
Absolutely. Your privacy is our priority:

‚Ä¢ Conversations are end-to-end encrypted
‚Ä¢ Only you can access your conversations
‚Ä¢ Administrators cannot read your content
‚Ä¢ We don't share or sell your data to third parties
‚Ä¢ We don't use your conversations to train models without your explicit consent

You can export or delete your conversations anytime from:
Settings > Privacy > Export/Delete Data

stillNeedHelp.title: Still need help?
stillNeedHelp.description: If you didn't find the answer you were looking for, our support team is here to help you.

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Building the future of emotional artificial intelligence

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: Democratize access to virtual companions with real emotional intelligence. We believe AI should be accessible, customizable, and respectful of user privacy, allowing each person to create meaningful connections with technology that truly understands them.

story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: AI Creator was born from a simple question: why do conversational AIs feel so... mechanical? In 2024, a team of AI researchers, developers, and designers came together with the vision of creating something different.
story.paragraph2: Instead of chatbots with predefined responses, we imagined virtual companions with real emotions that evolve, long-term memories that persist, and personalities that feel authentic. We wanted to build a platform where users had complete control over their experiences, without arbitrary censorship or artificial limitations.
story.paragraph3: Today, AI Creator serves thousands of users worldwide, from writers developing characters, to people seeking meaningful companionship, to developers exploring the frontiers of emotional AI. And we're just getting started.

innovation.title: Continuous Innovation
innovation.description: We implement the latest research in emotional AI, episodic memory, and natural language processing.

community.title: Community First
community.description: We build alongside our community, listening to feedback and co-creating features.

privacy.title: Privacy and Security
privacy.description: Your conversations are private. We never sell data or train models with your content without permission.

quality.title: Quality over Quantity
quality.description: We prefer to launch well-polished features that work correctly, not rush incomplete products.

accessibility.title: Universal Accessibility
accessibility.description: A generous free plan ensures everyone can experience emotional AI, without economic barriers.

transparency.title: Total Transparency
transparency.description: We're open about how our technology works, our policies, and our product decisions.

features.title: What Makes Us Different?
features.subtitle: Cutting-edge technology that puts user experience first
features.item2: Long-term memory with Life Events Timeline
features.item3: Multi-agent worlds with emergent social dynamics
features.item4: Total customization: personality, appearance, voice, and behavior
features.item5: No arbitrary censorship - total creative freedom
features.item6: Open source and complete technical documentation

team.title: The Team
team.description: A multidisciplinary team passionate about the intersection of AI, psychology, and user experience.

join.title: Join the Emotional AI Revolution
join.description: Start free today and discover what it's like to have truly meaningful conversations with AI.
